      • getAssociatedEffects

        public java.util.List<ImbuementEffect> getAssociatedEffects(org.bukkit.Material type)
        Returns a list of effects associated with the given item type. No information about potency is provided. To get a list of effects to apply to an imbued item, use the getCombinedEffects(Material...) method instead

      • getCombinedEffects

        public ImbuementSet getCombinedEffects(org.bukkit.Material... types)
        Provides a list of effects obtained as if a player with 0 bonus imbued them together.

      • getCombinedEffects

        public ImbuementSet getCombinedEffects(double bonusPotency,
                                       org.bukkit.Material... types)

      • getApplicableMaterials

        public java.util.Set<org.bukkit.Material> getApplicableMaterials(org.bukkit.Material[] types)
        Sifts through the given types and returns a set of types with associated ImbuementEffects.
        Returns:
        an empty set if types is null or empty, or the set of all types defined in the config;

      • getPotencyBonus

        public double getPotencyBonus(QuestPlayer player)
        Calculates the bonus to potency the given player would have. This is based on the Imbuement skill. If useSkill is disabled, returns 0.

      • getImbuementSlots

        public int getImbuementSlots(QuestPlayer player)
        Calculates how many slots a player should have. This is basedon the Imbuement skill. If useSkill is disabled, returns maxSlots.
